comment.p: Mimic uses text based drivers (HWC files).
Most games can be built from MAME sets. Several games are not in MAME though.

revision.comment: Updated dats for Mimic v2.10 (Frogger re-added).
Updated dats for Mimic v2.08 (Zaxxon removed, Afterburner 1, Afterburner 2, Thunderblade, Alien Syndrome and Tetris bootleg added).
Updated dats for Mimic v2.00 (some System-E games removed and Asteroids, Gals Pinball, Hot Pinball added).
Updated dats for Mimic v1.08 (Mat Mania and some Galaxian clones added).
Updated dats for Mimic v1.06 (Moon Cresta added).
Updated dats for Mimic v1.05 (13 games added).
Added Lucky Today to the dats.
Added new HWC files for v1.04.
Added Ms. Pac-man to the dats.
Released CMPro/RomCenter dats for Mimic v1.02.
Released CMPro/RomCenter dats for Mimic v1.01.
Logiqx released CMPro/RomCenter dats for Mimic v1.00.
